types.html:
auto-da-fé m (plural auto-da-fés)

  1. alternative spelling of autodafé
    • 1759, Voltaire, Candide, page 19:
      Comment on fit un bel auto-da-fé pour empêcher les tremblements de terre, et comment Candide fut fessé.
      'How we made a beautiful auto-da-fé to prevent earthquakes, and how Candide was spanked.
